creator: Higher Education Strategy Associates
title: 2.19: Alex Usher on Canadian Higher Education
author: Higher Education Strategy Associates
content:encoded: Our guest this week is Alex Usher, President and CEO of Higher Education Strategy Associates. Alex joins co-producer Tiffany MacLennan to talk about the Canadian Higher Education sector, higher education consulting, and his thoughts on the future of higher education.
